amendment.description: Amendment allows priority to be given to grants that provide for the establishment of programs regarding methods of early and appropriate identification of children with disabilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 108-79 to amend the State Competitive Grant Program in the bill to give priority to applications that provide for the establishment of professional development programs regarding methods of early and appropriate identification of children with disabilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wu amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Wu.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wu amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
